description.value:
This wooden broom functions like a mundane broom until you stand astride it and take a Magic|XPHB action to make it hover beneath you, at which time it can be ridden in the air. It has a Fly Speed|XPHB of 50 feet. It can carry up to 400 pounds, but its Fly Speed|XPHB becomes 30 feet while carrying over 200 pounds. The broom stops hovering when you land or when you're no longer riding it. As a Magic|XPHB action, you can send the broom to travel alone to a destination within 1 mile of you if you name the location and are familiar with it. The broom comes back to you when you take a Magic|XPHB action and use a command word if the broom is still within 1 mile of you.

Attunement: true
